meanings.definition: Having the most elasticity or flexibility among a group of objects.
meanings.sent1: The rubberiest band stretched the farthest.
meanings.sent2: The rubberiest ball bounced the highest.
meanings.sent3: The rubberiest gloves made it easy to juggle slippery objects.
meanings.sent4: Her rubberiest attitude helped her bounce back from setbacks.
meanings.sent5: The rubberiest material felt like it could stretch endlessly.

meanings.definition: Being the most resistant to wear or damage among a group of objects.
meanings.sent1: The rubberiest tires lasted the longest on rough roads.
meanings.sent2: The rubberiest shoes stayed in good condition after many hikes.
meanings.sent3: He wore his rubberiest shoes to avoid slipping on the wet floor.
meanings.sent4: Her rubberiest umbrella shielded her from the heaviest rain.
meanings.sent5: The rubberiest material seemed invincible against scratches and tears.
